title: 820-3115-b no PP5V_S3
message:
hi, i have a 820-3115-b which is not turning, but there is green light in charger.
i have measured following voltages:
ppbus_g3h is around 12.43v
PPVRTC_G3H  is 3.3v
smc_on_l is 3.3v
but pp5v_s3 is missing.
i have tried changing u7200 but it didn't fixed it, also the pch is getting hot when magsafe is connected to it.
board have no history of liquid damage.

title: 820-3115-b no PP5V_S3
message:
Looks like bad PCH, if gets hot in off state...
Do you get correct 3V3_SUS, 5V_SUS, 3V3_S5?

title: 820-3115-b no PP5V_S3
message: Yes sus voltages are present, i think its pch as its getting boiling hot

title: 820-3115-b no PP5V_S3
message:
PCH has no reason to get hot in S5 state, when is powered only from 3V3_S5, 3V3_SUS and VCCRTC...
Sometime RTC block fails and sink to much current.
Your PCH is dead...

title: 820-3115-b no PP5V_S3
message: Can we replace pch from donor board?

title: 820-3115-b no PP5V_S3
message: Yes but you have to clean the ME region. More of a time waster/rainy day project

title: 820-3115-b no PP5V_S3
message:
For the price of a new PCH, I don't recommend to bother you reballing old one.
New PCH also requires clean ME region...
